title: MLB is Back with Noah Garden
itunes:title: MLB is Back with Noah Garden
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch discuss the return of Tiger Woods, the longevity of the NBA season, issues within the NFL and the beginning of the Major League Baseball season. The hosts are joined by Noah Garden, MLB Chief Revenue Officer as they talk about the upcoming season, partnerships and more on Thursday's Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
